description.value:
The nosferatu transforms into a swarm of pale-gray rats. They gain a land Speed of 30 feet and a climb Speed of 10 feet, and they become Large. In this swarm form, the nosferatu can take an action to deal each enemy in the swarm's space @Damage[2d10[piercing]|options:area-damage] damage with a @Check[reflex|basic|options:area-effect] save, with a high DC for the nosferatu's level. A creature that fails its save is also exposed to plague of ancients.
